FOSSEE/Common-Interface-Project.summary: Recent activities include updates to the XmlParser file for Splitblock geometry, cleanup of code for simplicity, and updates to the ExplicitLink for resolving differences in y values. Additionally, xsl files have been updated for geometry point values. These changes aim to enhance the overall functionality and efficiency of the project.

FOSSEE/certificate-generator.summary: Recent activities involve the generation of Arduino Workshop Certificates, indicating the project's functionality in producing certificates for specific workshops or events.
